name: WEDUBOX - Legency
tag_list: elearning, online-courses, masschallenge, university, online, latam
overview:
Wedubox is the biggest knowledge supermarket for Spain and Latin America.

Wedubox works directly with professors, content creators and small / medium higher education institutions. Wedubox share up to 70% of the sales with professors and institutions.

In just 3 months wedubox have more than 1.900 professors (content creators) from 27 countries.

Wedubox have 3 business:

  1. Mass Market: People looking for online courses (formal and non formal) that are provided by professors or institutions.

  2. Virtual Education as a Service. A product for small and medium universities that don´t have the budget or knowledge to implement formal online programs. Wedubox provide the LMS, best practices, training for professors, payment platform, inbound marketing and cloud computing.

  3. Corporate University. A product for companies that want to manage their internal coursea and knowledge management. Wedubox provide the LMS platform, training and consulting services.

Wedubox Partners: Visionaria Games (Mexico) London School of Business and Finance (England) Tridat (Carnegie Mellon english course) (India) Vectorial Studios (Colombia) Tatvasoft (India) Escuela colombiana de Marketing (Colombia) Rackspace (USA)

Courses provided by Wedubox professors and institutions (in spanish):
